definitions.definition: Any material used to seal a surface so as to prevent passage of a fluid .
A mixture of polymers , fillers, and pigments used to fill and seal joints where moderate movement is expected.

main_definition: Any material used to seal a surface so as to prevent passage of a fluid .
secondary_definitions: ( construction ) A mixture of polymers , fillers, and pigments used to fill and seal joints where moderate movement is expected.
